text: {"tiddlers":{"$:/language/Buttons/CloseAll/Caption":{"text":"Close All","title":"$:/language/Buttons/CloseAll/Caption","tags":""},"$:/language/Buttons/CloseAll/Hint":{"text":"Close all by tag","title":"$:/language/Buttons/CloseAll/Hint","tags":""},"$:/language/Buttons/OpenAll/Caption":{"text":"Open All","title":"$:/language/Buttons/OpenAll/Caption"},"$:/language/Buttons/OpenAll/Hint":{"text":"Open all by tag","title":"$:/language/Buttons/OpenAll/Hint"},"$:/pluginlibrary/ajh/released":{"text":"The plugin library for the latest and greatest plugins from [ext[t5a|https://github.com/t5a/t5a.github.io.git]]; most recent released versions of plugins by [ext[Andrew|http://t5a.github.io/#Andrew%20Harrison]].","url":"https://t5a.github.io/plugins","title":"$:/pluginlibrary/ajh/released","tags":"$:/tags/PluginLibrary","caption":"Tiddlywiki Library for Plugins by Andrew Harrison"},"$:/plugins/ajh/closeall/template":{"text":"\define lingo-base()$:/language/Buttons/ <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/CloseAll/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/CloseAll/Caption}} class='tc-btn-invisible openall'><$list filter='[tag{!!title}]'><$action-sendmessage $message='tm-close-tiddler' $param=<>/><$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/core/images/close-all-button}}<$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'><>","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/closeall/template","tags":"$:/tags/TagDropdown"},"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/icon":{"text":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/icon","tags":"$:/tags/Image"},"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/image":{"text":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/image","tags":"$:/tags/Image"},"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/license":{"text":"Open All Copyright (c) 2019-<> Andrew Harrison [[BSD 3-Clause License|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/t5a/t5a.github.io/master/LICENSE]]","url":"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/t5a/t5a.github.io/master/LICENSE","type":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/license","tags":"$:/tags/License","license-type":"BSD 3-Clause License"},"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/readme":{"text":"This plugin adds the ''openall'' button and the {{$:/core/images/close-all-button}} ''closeall'' button to the tag manager drop down menu using the <>system tag. The open all button opens all non system tiddlers tagged with that drop down tag. The close all button closes all non system tiddlers tagged with that drop down tag. This plugin comprises: * Image * Template * Stylesheet * Caption and hint","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/readme","tags":""},"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/stylesheet":{"text":"html .tc-drop-down button svg, html .tc-drop-down a svg {fill:{{!!button-color}};}html .tc-drop-down button.tc-btn-invisible:hover svg {fill:{{!!button-hover-color}};}html .tc-sidebar-lists .tc-drop-down button svg, html .tc-drop-down a svg {fill:{{!!sidebar-button-color}};}html .tc-sidebar-lists .tc-drop-down button.tc-btn-invisible:hover svg {fill:{{!!sidebar-button-hover-color}};}.tc-badge-openall {fill:#30f;stroke:#f00;stroke-width:2;}.tc-icon-openall {fill:#fff;height:24pt;width:24pt;}","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/stylesheet","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","sidebar-button-hover-color":"#04b","sidebar-button-color":"#9cf","caption":"Open All Button","button-hover-color":"#fff","button-color":"#06f"},"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/template":{"text":"\define lingo-base()$:/language/Buttons/ <$button tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/OpenAll/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/OpenAll/Caption}} class='tc-btn-invisible openall'><$list filter='[tag{!!title}]'><$action-navigate $to=<>/><$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'>{{$:/plugins/ajh/openall/image}}<$list filter='[prefix[yes]]'><>","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/openall/template","tags":"$:/tags/TagDropdown"}}}
title: $:/plugins/ajh/openall
